Code Club will restart for the 2026 spring semester on **January 19^th^**,
meeting on **Mondays at 4 pm**.

Please **sign up** [using this Google form](https://forms.gle/eYkMvmJShrcANUrt5)
to be added to our mailing list and receive meeting locations and link info!
*(We have separate mailing lists for each semester, so please sign up again even
if you've joined before.)*

**If you are a total R beginner**, we highly recommend that you take a look at the material from the ["R for
Reproducibility" workshop on August 18^th^](../posts/ZZ_2025-08_workshop/)
before joining Code Club!

<hr style="height:1pt; visibility:hidden;" />
:::
